labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: User is able to select an image and click 'Open', and is then unable to close the Settings until they click 'Reset'
data.expected_result: Nothing should happen, the button should be hidden/disabled.
data.short_description: Clicking "Upload Image" for the Server icon opens the dialog even when the user doesn't have permission to change it
data.steps_to_repro: - Give a user Kick & Ban permissions - As the user, open the new settings menu - Click "Upload Image"
